[DQC.US.0127.9591] The statement 1003004 - Statement - Condensed Consolidated Balance Sheets (Unaudited) includes the concept us-gaap:NotesReceivableNet in the presentation tree. The filing does not include a dimensional structure for this statement. The filing does not include a default value for this presentation item us-gaap:NotesReceivableNet but does include dimensionalized values for this element of the following:
4,876,000,000
If the dimensionalized value appears in the financial statements, then a dimension needs to be added to the report. If the item has no value on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed from the financial statements.
Total Element : us-gaap:NotesReceivableNet Total period : 2021-06-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:FinancialInstrumentAxis=us-gaap:CommercialLoanMember
Rule Element Id:9591 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://xbrl.fasb.org/us-gaap/2021/elts/us-gaap-2021-01-31.xsd 11820
